channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: 英国のフューチャー社は、パブリッシャーに広告配信技術を提供し、プログラマティックや直接販売を通じてオンライン広告在庫の販売を支援するエレベイト社を立ち上げる（Dominic Ponsford/Press Gazette）
item.description:
Dominic Ponsford / Press Gazette:
The UK's Future launches Elevate, which offers ad-serving tech to publishers and helps them sell their online ad inventory through programmatic and direct sales  —  Future Elevate works on a revenue share and payment up-front model.  —  Future plc has launched a new brand called Elevate based around selling …

item.title: 調査アメリカ黒人の88％が、黒人に関するニュースが不正確だと思うことがあると回答。
item.description:
Kiana Cox / Pew Research Center:
Survey: 88% of Black Americans say they sometimes come across news about Black people they think is inaccurate; 72% say the inaccuracies were created on purpose  —  Table of Contents Table of Contents  — Most Black adults say they experience racial discrimination

item.title: アンペールSVODサービスの支出は2024年末までにヨーロッパの主要テレビ市場で100億ユーロに達し、公共放送や商業放送の投資を上回る（Naman Ramachandran/Variety）
item.description:
Naman Ramachandran / Variety:
Ampere: SVOD services' spending is set to hit €10B in Europe's major TV markets by the end of 2024, surpassing public and commercial broadcasters' investment  —  Spending by subscription video-on-demand (SVOD) platforms is set to hit €10 billion ($10.7 billion) …

item.title: カリフォルニア・ジャーナリズム保護法を改正し、プラットフォームへの基金への支払いを義務付け、各メディアが雇用する記者の数に応じて支払いを行う（Laurel Rosenhall/Los Angeles Times）
item.description:
Laurel Rosenhall / Los Angeles Times:
Lawmakers amend the California Journalism Preservation Act to make platforms pay into a fund and base payments on the number of journalists an outlet employs  —  California lawmakers have revived legislation to charge online platforms for the news articles they publish …

item.title: グーグル、Google TVの125以上の無料チャンネルに広告主がターゲット広告を配信可能に、2023年には米国の月間アクティブGoogle TVおよびAndroid TV OS端末が2,000万台以上になると報告（Umar Shakir/The Verge）
item.description:
Umar Shakir / The Verge:
Google lets advertisers serve targeted ads across Google TV's 125+ free channels, and reports 20M+ US monthly active Google TV and Android TV OS devices in 2023  —  Google is launching a new advertising network that serves targeted ads to Google TV-powered streaming boxes and smart TVs.

item.title: 情報源Cineworldは～100館を含む英国事業の売却または再編を検討中、Regalの親会社は2023年8月に破産を免れる（Mark Kleinman/Sky News）
item.description:
Mark Kleinman / Sky News:
Sources: Cineworld is exploring a sale or restructuring of its UK business, which includes ~100 theaters; the Regal parent exited bankruptcy in August 2023  —  The multiplex giant is working with AlixPartners on options for its UK business which could lead to a sale or restructuring …

item.title: サン紙、テレグラフ紙、タイムズ紙など英出版社、報道規制機関IPSOがアバディーン・ライブ紙の公開法廷報道を否定する裁定を下し、懸念を表明（Charlotte Tobitt/Press Gazette）
item.description:
Charlotte Tobitt / Press Gazette:
The Sun, The Telegraph, The Times, and other UK publishers raise concerns after press regulator IPSO ruled against open court reporting by the Aberdeen Live  —  Publishers including The Sun, The Telegraph and The Times have raised the alarm over a ruling from the UK's biggest press regulator that …

item.title: Apple TV+がInSightを追加、Amazon X-Rayのような機能で、画面に表示される俳優名や曲名を視聴者が学習できるようになる（Lauren Forristal/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Lauren Forristal / TechCrunch:
Apple TV+ adds InSight, a feature similar to Amazon X-Ray that will allow viewers to learn actor names and song titles as they appear on the screen  —  At Apple's WWDC 2024, the company revealed a handy new feature for Apple TV+ called InSight.  The feature will allow viewers to learn actor names …

item.title: パンチボール・ニュースは、2025年初頭に開始するプレミアム・ポリシー会員の一環として、技術政策の垂直立ち上げを発表した（パンチボール・ニュース）
item.description:
Punchbowl News:
Punchbowl News announces a tech policy vertical as part of its Premium Policy membership, which will launch in early 2025  —  Punchbowl News is taking on tech coverage.  Let us tell you why.  —  How Washington tackles the perils and promises of technology is one of the biggest questions of the day.

item.title: ロジャーズ・コミュニケーションズがNBCユニバーサルおよびWBDと複数年契約を結び、9月にNBCユニバーサルのブラボーチャンネルを含むカナダ向けコンテンツを提供（Priyanka.G/Reuters）
item.description:
Priyanka.G / Reuters:
Rogers Communications strikes multi-year deals with NBCUniversal and WBD to bring their content to Canada, including NBCUniversal's Bravo channel in September  —  Rogers Communications (RCIb.TO) has entered into multi-year deals with Comcast-owned (CMCSA.O) NBCUniversal and Warner Bros Discover …

item.title: 情報筋：元ワーナー・ミュージック代表のエドガー・ブロンフマン・ジュニア氏が、すでにスカイダンスへの売却交渉が進んでいるナショナル・アミューズメンツに20億ドルから25億ドルを提示する模様（ウォール・ストリート・ジャーナル）。
item.description:
Wall Street Journal:
Sources: ex-Warner Music head Edgar Bronfman Jr. looks to offer $2B to $2.5B for National Amusements, which is already in advanced talks to sell to Skydance  —  Bronfman, backed by Bain Capital, has expressed interest in Shari Redstone's National Amusements, which is already in advanced negotiations to sell to Skydance Media

item.title: サービス、広告、AIライセンシング、慈善事業など、収益源を多様化させるAPの方法、2023年の収益の82％はコンテンツライセンシングから（Charlotte Tobitt/Press Gazette）
item.description:
Charlotte Tobitt / Press Gazette:
How the AP is diversifying its revenue streams, including services, ads, AI licensing, and philanthropy; 82% of its 2023 revenue came from content licensing  —  AP revenue boss says “not all” diversification efforts will work but “we have to experiment”.  —  The Associated Press has revealed …

item.title: ヤフースポーツが2024年パリ五輪の特派員に五輪金メダリストを起用、USAスイミングとコンテンツ配信で提携（Alex Weprin/The Hollywood Reporter）
item.description:
Alex Weprin / The Hollywood Reporter:
Yahoo Sports hires Olympic gold medalists as correspondents for the 2024 Paris Olympics and partners with USA Swimming on a content distribution deal  —  The digital brand has tapped Olympians Allyson Felix, Kerri Walsh Jennings, Shawn Johnson East, Missy Franklin and Katie Hoff to be correspondents from the games.

item.title: イスラエルは、アルジャジーラの同国での活動禁止を、安全保障上の脅威を理由に、さらに45日間延長した。
item.description:
Steven Scheer / Reuters:
Israel extends a ban on Al Jazeera's operations in the country for another 45 days, citing a security threat, after a court upheld an initial 35-day ban  —  A ban on Al Jazeera's operations in Israel was extended for another 45 days by Israel's telecoms regulator on Sunday after the cabinet agreed …

item.title: 申請中：パラマウントの支配株主であるシャリー・レッドストーンは、取締役選挙で6人の候補者の中で最下位の3,220万票、最多の90万5,000票を獲得（Zaheer Kachwala/Reuters）
item.description:
Zaheer Kachwala / Reuters:
Filing: Paramount controlling shareholder Shari Redstone received 32.2M board election votes, the lowest among six candidates, and 905K votes against, the most  —  Paramount Global (PARA.O) controlling shareholder Shari Redstone received the fewest votes among other directors in the company's board election, a filing on Friday showed.
